title: Bonus 7: Steve and Garry Talk Heresy
itunes:title: Bonus: Steve and Garry Talk Heresy
description: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I talk about Gnosticism and its origins in the Jewish apocalyptic literature. We have a few rants. I also have an announcement and explanation.
content:encoded: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I talk about Gnosticism and its origins in the Jewish apocalyptic literature. We have a few rants. I also have an announcement and explanation.
itunes:subtitle: Gnosticism and its origins in the Jewish apocalyptic literature.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Stephen Guerra
